description: This file defines a business contact search agent utilizing Google Maps API functionalities, including search, directions, geocoding, address validation, and more. It sets up an agent with tools for mapping and web scraping, and demonstrates various example queries related to location-based data.

methods.name: Agent
methods.description: Constructor for creating an agent with specified tools, description, instructions, and display options.

methods.name: agent.print_response
methods.description: Method to output responses for various location and business queries, supporting streaming output.
